result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Ronald A Massie

records.addlTxt: Status conference on November 11, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

11:32 AM cases 22CF769, 21CF983, 22CF842, 20CF756, 19CF1699, 22CF837, 22CT201 called. Prosecuting Attorney Andrew James Gunderson in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Ronald A Massie in court, in custody with Attorney Robert Allen Thorson. Defense confirms receipt of the Information. Defendant waives reading of Information and enters Not Guilty pleas in 22CF769, 21CF983, 22CF842, 22CF837, 22CT201. Court receives the pleas.

Status Conference set in 22CF769, 21CF983, 22CF842, 22CF837, 22CT201 and Order to Show Cause set in 20CF756, 19CF1699 on 11/11/2022 at 1:30 PM

Cases called at 1:29 PM: 19CF1699, 20CF756, 21CF983, 22CF769, 22CF837, 22CF842, 22CT201.
Defendant Ronald A Massie in court, in custody.  Attorney Robert Allen Thorson in court for Ronald A Massie.  Attorney Kelly Ronquist in court for State of Wisconsin. 
State in compliance with victim notification requirements. Defendant waives his right to Preliminary Hearings in 21CF983, 22CF769, 22CF837, 22CF842.
Branch 5 to schedule further proceedings.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
11:14 AM cases 22CF837, 22CF842 called. Prosecuting attorney Monica A Fallon in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Ronald A Massie appeared by video, in custody with Attorney Sonia Anderson. 
Defense waives reading of the complaint. State requests $5000 cash bond- Defense objects. Court orders $500 cash bond. 
All of defendant's files: Preliminary hearing scheduled for 8-9-22 at 1:30 PM.

Conditions: 
Defendant to maintain absolute sobriety. 
Comply with Pre-Trial Monitoring Services with possible testing based on monitoring level. 
Cover 22CF837 & 22CF842
